meta.title: Home - Bridgewater-Raritan Regional School District

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme2

h3.img: Strategic PlanWe will teach them One and All... So one day They will take the lead
Our MissionWe will teach them One and All... So one day They will take the lead

br.img: RegistrationRegister your child for Kindergarten or First Grade
STARLearn about the benefits of a technology infused classroom

h3.img: Superintendent SearchSeeking an outstanding educational leader with the vision and drive to lead our school district.
Submit AttendanceStudents must login daily in order to record attendance.

div.p: We will teach them One and All
Young to Old and Big to Small
Improve our world and make it great
So one day They will take the lead…

img.alt: Planning Board with Post it Notes-Human-oriented company

p.em: Communication is key ~ reach out if you need help!

article.a: Continue Reading about 2020-04-21 Update - COVID-19 - Day 21 - Planning

img.alt: Calculator, graph paper, pen and paper clip

div.p: Budget presentation released early for public review

article.a: Continue Reading about 2020-2021 Budget Presentation – April 28, 2020

img.alt: YOU ARE NOT ALONE written on a notice black board

p.br: Change is only scary until it becomes your new normal. Keep going ...

article.a: Continue Reading about 2020-04-17 Update - COVID-19 - Day 19 - New Normal

div.p: The Board of Education has approved Dr. Thomas Ficarra as Interim Superintendent.

div.div: Wade Administration Building - Conference Room A/B

div.p: BRRSD was named a 2019 Best Communities in the nation for music education by the National Association of Music Merchants Foundation (NAMM)
Always focused on health and wellness, BRRSD became a Start With Hello district in 2019.
BRHS was once again recognized as one of the best public high schools nationally by US News and World Report.
Students Taking Active Roles - 2019-2020 Our intermediate schools move to a 1:1 environment.
We will teach them One and All
Young to Old and Big to Small
Improve our world and make it great
So one day They will take the lead…
